author: samuraiturtle
title: The Motor Is The Star
review: I got this set for the pull-back motor.  And the giant flames did not hurt the sets likableness.  For those that do not know the maine model is a funny car or dragster (as some people would call it).  The second model witch I am guessing is some sort of furtue car, and yes it does have the pull-back motor in it.  One thing I do not get on the maine model is the flame placement, it should be out the exhaust pipes on the sides of the vechicle not out the back on the model as you can see above.
